item.title: The Explorer
item.description:
The Explorer

This was a little side project that transformed a few times through it's life.  It started as a design for a comic story I was helping to create, was re-designed as it was looking a bit derivative, to finally becoming an image piece.  It was quite fun to create and I hope enjoyable to look at.  Credit goes to Vitaly Bulgarov for a few of the kit bash pieces used and Sean Amlaner for the comp.

item.title: The Making of the Tiger Animation Rig: Built By Leading Visual Effects Industry Artists
item.description:
The Making of the Tiger Animation Rig: Built By Leading Visual Effects Industry Artists

Three weeks ago we launched our free Maya Tiger Animation Rig, a quadruped rig aimed at helping animators take their skills to the next level. The CG Spectrum rig was built by a some of the best CG artists in the industry. CG Supervisor at Martoos Studios Jeremy Chinn and Lead Animator at Weta Digital Morgan Loomis.

item.title: Sundance New Frontiers Lineup 2016
item.description:
Sundance New Frontiers Lineup 2016

Abbot's Book, a game I did a bit of work on for Blackthorn Media was selected for Sundance 2016.  Photo #17

item.title: A Day in the Life of a Professional 3D Modeller
item.description:
A Day in the Life of a Professional 3D Modeller

Get to know the talented professional artists and animators who make up the team of educators at CG Spectrum. Meet CG Spectrum Mentor of 3D Modelling Jeremy Chinn. Jeremy Chinn has been a lead modeller and title designer on probably every big film you have heard of in the last 8 years.

item.title: Free Tiger Animation Rig
item.description:
Free Tiger Animation Rig

Are you ready to take your animation skills to the next level? Want to create the most ferocious four-legged beast you can possibly imagine? At CG Spectrum we believe that it's important to give back to the community so we're releasing a feature film quality quadruped tiger rig for free!

item.title: Dragonflight environment work
item.description:
Dragonflight environment work

Here's a couple on the environment pieces I created for the game Dragonflight.  Check it out over on steam!
